vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
διατῠπόω,
form, χαρακτῆρας [Refs 1st c.BC+]; δ. νόμους give them a lasting form, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, [LXX+1st c.BC+]; of seals, to be engraved, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 metaphorically, imagine, conceive, active, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; δ. τῇ φαντασίᾳ[Refs 5th c.BC+]; represent, portray, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__3 make dispositions, of a testator, [Refs 6th c.AD+]; of a legislator,[Refs] —passive [Refs]; to be arranged, regulated by agreement, μεταξὺ τῶν Ἑλλγνίδων πόλεων.. ὁπόσα χρὴ ἑκάστην.. λύειν [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to be arranged, regulated by agreement
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to be arranged, regulated by agreement
